replies.body:
Can we still see our normal wins?

cuz i like them more than my ranked ranking :(

The Ezreal image will change depending of which champ is listed as "frequently played" ?

Could be amazing if we could pick a champ.
Correct! Your profile's background image will change based on what champion you've recently frequently played to match what your friends see when they hover over your name in their friends list.
One exception is if you own any ultimate skins and actively use its summoner icon, that will override your profile background image.

i think it would actually be cool if you could set your background like you want to any spash art of a champion/skin you own.

Also it would be cool if you had different ways to actually create your own, unique profile page.

The problem with the old client is that the profile page of a summoner looks the same for everybody.
The new one takes a step in the right direction, but imo there should be more ways to desing your profile page to make it unique.
That's good feedback! This is exactly why we're doing a public Alpha so that we can get your feedback as early in the development process as possible.
How about this; By default, the background will be your most frequently played champion. But there could also be an option that allows us to set the background ourselves to whichever champ we want.

I think it would be nice to tie that into champion Mastery. Make it more rewarding. Say once you reach a certain level of champion mastery, you unlock that champion's art to use as your background on your summoner page.

I also would like to support the idea of us being able to select what champion we feature on our profile page. I don't particularly care for the Recently Played selection.

Thanks for hearing us!

I think it would be cool if you could set the background image on your profile to be an animated Champion splash (like the ones in the League Screensaver app that have been used as log-in screens in the past).

I find a problem in that if it was too customizable then people could get confused on gaining the information the profile contains (take tumblr pages for example). You can fully customize tumblr html and if something was taken to that extreme in the league client, it could cause major clarity problems.

That's a bit boring, at best. At worst it's taking away from the value of the Ultimate skin's bonuses since anyone can get that profile "banner" simply by playing the champion. The least they could do is use the animated version, imo.
I would assume this means that it will override your background with the ultimate skin's splash art, not just the champion, similar to how you get a small slice on your profile right now.
I know, but I did kind of not think it through. I still think it's not much.
They are using the animated splashes for ultimate skins :)
Ya I saw the update, but I don't really want to delete this. Even though I made a mistake (was tired) and all it got was negative attention, I made it before that was put out :(

You don't get a Spirit Guard Udyr banner by playing Udyr. They're still exclusive to the skins' owners. And there's no reason to assume they won't already be the animated versions anyway. All 8 of the ultimate icons have animated splashes to match already made so we should expect those are the ones we'll see.
Need Lux ultimate skin confirmed. I need to maintain Lux background.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

One question I have is; what exactly is meant by "recently"? I understand what you mean, but I'm wondering if there's a specific time frame involved (ie: if you play x champion the most during the duration of a week then x champion becomes your background). I'm just trying to get a specific time frame.
I like the idea of champions you played being the one for your background, but I feel it would be better if it was your most played champion.

What determines what champions shows at the background of the new profile?
Can we choose our fav champion splash art?
What about championpoints ? I got 350k on heimer and I want that people see that ? Will they still show up under the lvl 7 border ?

The "motto" right below your summoner icon in the friends list, should be displayed somewhere in there too to add that extra personal voice.

*It'd be especially cool to be able to go online and view your most recent game and have it recorded in riot's "cloud" where you can select a 10ish second clip and then be able to insert your super cool play onto your profile. as a way of showing off your skills or to share some unique combo you found.{{summoner:31}}
Can we see more than just 3 of our top mastered champions? Sometimes it's nice to look at the in progress ones too and see all the champs everyone likes to play

Yes!  This profile view is the Overview, which is meant to give a (smaller) snapshot of **your** unique stats as a player, so a little bit of champ mastery, a little bit of level, a little bit of ranked, your general play style.  It's the intro to the Profile section, which in the future will include things like the Champions page that is in the legacy client.  There you can see all your mastery in champions, progress, overall mastery score, etc. :)

I can't access the profile page (alpha v2440390.2439472) and I'm not sure why that is. I installed alpha on 5/19. Any ideas what could be happening or is the profile page only rolled out on some clients?

Will the ranked system be changed so that when someone is in diamond 5 one can see "everyone" on diamond 5?
because there has been weird sorting by league names(?) so if I check my league in diamond 5 I get a name called "shaco's contenders" with only 74 summoners in it... I know there are more than 74 players in d5. Then where are the rest of them, and why are summoners sorted in such ways that people would not understand? I would love to see the whole population of summoners in my rank.

I hope they fix the "most recently played" feature then if that's going to be stuck as our background, I played 7 ranked games in a row with a majority of them being Braum, but "most recently played" shows me as random from some ARAMs I played before my ranked games.  I've never had the feature properly show my most recently played champs and that would suck to have it determine our background with the way it is now.
The background image should be customizable. Like a summoner icon, if you own a skin for a champion, the player can make that skin the background.
Can the background please be adjusted accordingly to the skin you used on the champion you played recently? If it's mixed then just the latest one.
Excuse me, but can we have a pause button for the client download It is rly annoying when i have to retry the downlaod each time i open lots of websites ?
